dialogue: You with us or what?
Well...? Don't you wanna get home to your pregnant wife?
Of course I do.
But this is somebody's life we're dealing with. Shouldn't we at least... talk about it...?
This is a joke, right?
No, it's a deliberation. You were ready to send this man to prison, maybe forever, just like that.
He doesn't have to. The "burden of proof" is on the prosecution. Does anyone have even the slightest hesitation that James Sythe is guilty?
If you have to think, you're aren't sure.
What I'm sure of is I got three kids to get home to!
We all have lives. None of us want to be here.
You just like pissing me off, then?
I have questions.
No.
So what the hell are we talking about?
I'm just saying the man saw somebody at that railing, right? Can we all agree on that?
So, isn't it possible that he saw someone other than James Sythe?
We could sit around all day talking about what's "possible."
I think we should.
That's between him and the Judge.
Bullshit. You were there.
He was investigating the case on his own. The Judge sent him home.
And we're just supposed to take your word for it and change our vote?
I'm just telling you what I know.
Hold up. I'm hearing way too many "maybes."
Too many maybes is reasonable doubt.
How about we all just take a breath. It's been a long day. But votes have changed, right? The process is working.
No it's not. You're wearing people down. Talking loud and saying nothing. You go over anything enough times, you'll start to question it.
Well I drive a bus. See the same faces every morning. And they do not change.
Then how am I sitting here?
What do you mean?
I should be dead.
Little over three years ago I wrapped my car around a tree with a blood alcohol level that probably should've killed me before I even got in the car. And somehow, I walked away with barely a scratch.
That's right. Like Marcus said, he ran with a bad crowd. He was bad news.
Did he ever lie to you?
Not that I remember.
Do you think he lied on the witness stand?
I'm not sure.
Not sure is reasonable doubt.
Yeah.
Yeah?
Yeah.
